Node.definition: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters

= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

Node.gloss: to be intelligent|to be discerning|to have insight|to be an expert
Node.definition: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= action by which humans speak written words aloud
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
literally: half of a day; hence: = the time when half of a day has elapsed
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend

= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= to prostrate oneself ► in order to pay homage to a superior
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the entire front side of a person's head, with special focus on the forehead, which is the part that touches the ground when a person does obeisance, and the part that is covered with sweat during hard work

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters

Node.gloss: to consider|to ponder|to observe|to take note of|to have regard for|to give heed to|to study
Node.definition: = action by which humans think about someone or something accompanied by a willingness to translate their conclusions into action if needed
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= an evergreen conifer that grows to a height of 20 meters and can live as long as 150 years; ◄ Pinus halepensis; Aleppo pine; ► the wood is suitable for carpentry work, and the leaves for building booths. Or alternatively, olive tree (oil tree)
literally: oil tree; hence: = wild olive tree; ◄ Olea europaea oleaster

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= an evergreen tree or bush, up to 1.5 m. high; dark glossy leaves are dense on the branches, and the flowers are white or pink; the whole plant gives off an agreeable odor; ► used by the Jews in the Feast of Tabernacles; regarded as a desirable tree, as opposed to thorns and thistles

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10 20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= area enclosed by walls or buildings

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= man, also known as Hoshea (הֹושֵׁעַ) and Joshua (יְהֹושֻׁעַ) ◄ son of Nun (נוּן) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► one of the twelve men sent by Moses (מֹשֶׁה) to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to Joshua (יְהֹושֻׁעַ) Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) into Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Elishama (אֱלִישָׁמָע) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► father of Hoshea (הֹושֵׁעַ) who is better known as Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= action by which humans speak written words aloud
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a large group of people has come together for a religious purpose
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
